summary:
*Army of the Dead* is a zombie movie where a group of mercenaries tries to rob a casino in Las Vegas during a zombie apocalypse. It's directed by Zack Snyder, who got the idea after making a similar movie called *Dawn of the Dead*. The film stars Dave Bautista and Ella Purnell.

The movie had a long journey to the screen, facing delays and even replacing a cast member due to misconduct allegations. It was released in 2021 and received mixed reviews, but it did win a special fan-voted Oscar. The success led to a new franchise with spin-offs and a sequel in the works.
title: Army of the Dead
